task.en: Open stickies and help me copy all the content into Notes.
task.zh: 打开我的stickies，然后帮我把所有的内容都拷贝到Notes里面。
task.ar: افتح stickies وساعدني في نسخ جميع المحتويات إلى Notes.
task.ja: 私のstickiesを開いて、すべての内容をNotesにコピーしてください。
task.ru: Откройте stickies и помогите мне скопировать все содержимое в Notes.

grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' 2>/dev/null | tr -d '\n' | grep 'Make a note of it!' | grep 'Stickies lets you keep notes (like these) on your desktop. Use a Stickies note to jot down reminders, lists, or other information. You can also use notes to store frequently used text or graphics.' | grep 'Your current notes appear when you open Stickies.' | grep 'To close this note, click the close button.' | grep 'Stickies has lots of other great features, including a spell checker, import and export features, and other ways to arrange and customize your notes. Plus, you’ll find a “Make New Sticky Note” service in many applications.' | grep 'Stickies has lots of other great features, including a spell checker, import and export features, and other ways to arrange and customize your notes. Plus, you’ll find a “Make New Sticky Note” service in many applications.' | grep -q 'Look in Help to find out more about using Stickies.' && echo "True" || echo "False"
